title: Brigand Cutthroat
summary: The Brigand Cutthroat is a deadly, close-combat specialist armed with twin daggers, known for his precision and dexterity. His muscular build and dark skin are partially obscured by a green hood, making him a fearsome and ruthless adversary in battle.

clothing.headwear: Green hood that obscures part of the face
clothing.pants: Green pants that match the hood

title: Brigand Fusilier
summary: The Brigand Fusilier is armed with a blunderbuss which he uses to suppress the bandits' foes with sprays of lead.

clothing.headwear: Green hood that obscures part of the face
clothing.outerwear: Green cloak and tan padded vest

title: Brigand Bloodletter
summary: The Brigand Bloodletter is a hulking, battle-scarred brute. Armed with a vicious cat o' nine tails whip and a deadly flintlock pistol, he is ready to give his enemies deep and bloody scars to match his.

clothing.headwear: Green hood that obscures part of the face
clothing.pants: Green pants that match the hood
